//: Digging up a tree requires more specific plant knowledge than simply foraging or farming. Without it you'll just kill the tree and waste your time.

Replanting a tree requires more specific plant knowledge than simply foraging or farming. If you don't take adequate care, you'll damage the root system, plant it crooked, or leave it to dry out and die.
Replanting a tree by hand is extremely difficult due to the weight and size of the tree. It takes a long time accordingly.
